0010100100101011 0101001110111111 0 -> sum: 0111110011101010, cout: 0
0000001000001001 1010110010010001 0 -> sum: 1010111010011010, cout: 0
0100011111010100 0001001000110010 0 -> sum: 0101101000000110, cout: 0
0000101001001110 0111100001000000 0 -> sum: 1000001010001110, cout: 0

0000001011010111 1011101011111001 0 -> sum: 1011110111010000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
